changes: Completely new UI
Search bar for mods
Bug fixes
Ability to add/delete your custom mods
Bug fixes
Ability to modify settings of mods (keybinds, etc.)
Reduced lag caused by modloader
Bug fixes
Mod menu button now appears only when it should (in menus & pause)
TAS Keybinds mod keybinds are now customizable
Upgraded the Community Levels mod, courtesy of skymen. Available in Crash Test Level Editor
Fixed cards overflowing the rows in the mod menu
Disabling mods that require a reload, and choosing to reload later, will change the mod's state to 'Reload Required'
Edit custom mods' settings
Error messages for custom mods that fail to load
Skins menu! Play with custom skins from the community.
Note: some skins are not available across all versions due default skins availablitity per version.
Deprecated GUI mod. You can enable the same GUI elements as mods in the menu
They are listed as FPS, keystrokes, position, and state
Added mobile support and customization for these GUI elements
Removed keystrokes mod from mobile due to bugs
It will be back in the future
Added keystrokes mod for mobile
Added the replay system!
Save your replays, view them, race against them, and compare them against each other
Fixed bugs with the replay system
Fixed bugs with the custom skin system
Added the skin STEVE from the Minecraft Movie! (1.4.4+)
